data.message: I want to ask if someone will deal with an account who's been stolen from me I have attached thereto a credit card

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing a hacked account, Martin. First, try to secure the account at: http://on.fb.me/1xafGAx. Next, if you need to reset the password, use these step-by-step directions: http://on.fb.me/1xafGkj. -Sarah

i try it but i cant connect becouse hacker change my email.and when i want reset password so i cant send password on my email I can just send on email hacker.  account is https://www.facebook.com/martin.burda18 not this of which I write
now everything is fine thank you
